Description.Text:
Property Location
In the heart of Ahmedabad, Hyatt Ahmedabad is close to Gujarat University and Gulmohar Park Mall. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of ISCON Mall and Sardar Patel Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 178 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers.

Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Ahmedabad? This resort has 7995 square feet (743 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

In the heart of Ahmedabad, Hyatt Ahmedabad is close to Gujarat University and Gulmohar Park Mall. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of ISCON Mall and Sardar Patel Stadium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Gujarat University - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Gulmohar Park Mall - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
ISCON Mall - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Sardar Patel Stadium - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Sanskar Kendra Museum - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Sabarmati Riverfront - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Manek Chowk - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Gandhi Ashram - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Hathi Singh Temple - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Jama Masjid Mosque - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Subhash Bridge - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Swaminarayan Temple - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Sidi Bashir Mosque and the Shaking Minarets - 7.3 km / 4.6 mi
Naginawadi - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi
Adalaj Vav - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi

The preferred airport for Hyatt Ahmedabad is Ahmedabad (AMD-Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Intl.) - 9.9 km / 6.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
